sn11.2:2.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo susimam devaputtam amantesi:
sn11.2:2.5: ‘Evam, bhaddantava’ti kho, bhikkhave, susimo devaputto sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva pamadam apadesi.
sn11.2:2.6: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo susimam devaputtam amantesi …pe…
sn11.2:2.8: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo susimam devaputtam amantesi …pe…
sn11.2:2.10: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo susimam devaputtam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn11.2:8.1: So hi nama, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo sakam punnaphalam upajivamano devanam tavatimsanam issariyadhipaccam rajjam karento utthanaviriyassa vannavadi bhavissati.
sn11.2:8.2: Idha kho tam, bhikkhave, sobhetha, yam tumhe evam svakkhate dhammavinaye pabbajita samana utthaheyyatha ghateyyatha vayameyyatha appattassa pattiya, anadhigatassa adhigamaya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
